reviewText: A must have video of the evolution of a Trinidad Mas Band from iti's conception through production to completion and presentation.  The work of T&Ts top bandleader of today. Amazing, awesome, fantastic, unbelievable - does not nearly cover the creativity, skill, passion, organization, etc. that goes into such a production year after year!  Kudos to Mr. MacFarlane and his team and may he long keep the true meaning of TTs Carnival alive!
